news.title: Catherine Connolly announces bid for the Áras as Social Democrats back presidential campaign
news.summary: Independent TD Catherine Connolly will launch her presidential campaign next week, with the Social Democrats confirming they will back her nomination.

news.title: Gardaí arrest man (40s) following death of pensioner in Limerick city assault
news.summary: A man in his 40s has been arrested by gardaí investigating the death of a pensioner following an assault in Limerick city last night.

news.summary: The Lions didn’t only play rugby on their first tour to Australia 137 years ago.

news.title: ‘Why didn’t I just hold her’ – Ashling Murphy’s boyfriend Ryan Casey reflects on couple’s final moments together
news.summary: Ryan Casey (27), the boyfriend of the murdered Ashling Murphy (23), has spoken out about the regret he feels about the last moments he saw her alive.

news.title: Katie Taylor set to pocket $6m from New York trilogy fight bonanza
news.summary: Katie Taylor and Amanda Serrano go head-to-head for a third time in just over three years in the early hours of tomorrow morning for another multi-million pay day that has elevated the female fight game to another level.

news.title: Irish beach etiquette: the 16 dos and don’ts of hot weather behaviour
news.summary: The sky is azure blue, the sun shining and a mini-heatwave will be in place across the country for the next three days.

news.summary: “I didn’t trust myself to have a credit card until I got sober,” says Saz Cartin, as she lists the financial benefits of sobriety.
